body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth             Kids & Youth       Look for the family symbol on the current schedules of activities and programs. Click on the links here and have fun with some Cape Cod National Seashore quizzes and scavenger hunts! title: Cape Cod National Seashore: Kids & Youth
